trans:
In view of the CSG CRDS exemption (rate of social security contributions 7.5% instead of 17.2%), could you please send me a copy of the attached sworn statement, completed and signed, together with a copy of the latest P60 form? (AP60 is a statement outlining the tax and National Insurance (NI) contributions paid over the previous tax year). This document will establish proof of affiliation to the British social security system.
In order to apply the 15% flat-rate works charge, can you please send me a sworn statement that any works of any kind have been carried out on the property (common or private parties) since the purchase?
Best regards,
Elisabeth PASQUIER-SOURAUD
